title: Rufus The Hawk, Immigrant Children Seek Citizenship In U.S., NRBQ's Terry Adams
teaser: Rufus the Hawk chases pigeons away at Wimbledon, Ramon Garcia says the immigration court system is not prepared for the deluge of children entering the U.S and Terry Adams talks new music and fun.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
